```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
ewr_flights <- readRDS(here("prepared_data/ewr_flights.rds"))
```

## Histogram of distances

```{r}
ewr_flights %>% 
  ggplot() +
  geom_histogram(
    aes(x = distance),
    binwidth = 100
  )
```
